Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS
REPORTED REFERRED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Votes.VoteType: Favorable refer to committee Ways and Means

Title: Requires commercial garages containing electric vehicle charging stations to ensure public access to such charging stations
Summary: Requires commercial garages containing electric vehicle charging stations to ensure public access to such charging stations at commercially reasonable rental or fee rates.
LawCode: Add ยง18-a, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to requiring commercial garages containing electric vehicle charging stations to ensure public access to such charging stations commercially reasonable rental or fee rates
